profiles.name: Change left control to hyper and caps lock to control/escape

rules.description: map left shift to opening parenthesis
map right shift to closing parenthesis
map left command to opening bracket mustache
map right command to closing bracket mustache
map left shift to opening parenthesis
map right shift to closing parenthesis
map left command to opening bracket mustache
map right command to closing bracket mustache
Change caps_lock to control when used as modifier, escape when used alone
SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
